alert.note: Alert for Bandera; Real (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 20 at 11:13PM CDT until April 20 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN BANDERA AND SOUTHEASTERN REAL COUNTIES... At 1113 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Tuff, or 7 miles north of Leakey, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Leakey, Vanderpool, Lost Maples State Natural Area and Tuff. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
